name: openrpc
description: Interact with and discover JSON-RPC APIs via [OpenRPC](https://open-rpc.org/).

tools.name: rpc_call
tools.description: Call any JSON-RPC method on a server with parameters. A user would prompt: Call method <method> on <server url> with params <params>

tools.name: rpc_discover
tools.description: This uses JSON-RPC to call `rpc.discover` which is part of the OpenRPC Specification for discovery for JSON-RPC servers. A user would prompt: What JSON-RPC methods does this server have? <server url>
